resources.string: You are about to discard an invitation. Proceed?

You are using Olvid for Android
Version %1$s (build %2$d)

Server API: %3$d
Engine DB schema: %4$d
Application DB schema: %5$d
App running for: %6$s

You are using Olvid for Android
Version %1$s (build %2$d)

Server API: %3$d
Engine DB schema: %4$d
Application DB schema: %5$d

Extra features: %6$s
App running for: %7$s

It appears that the Olvid app has Background Restriction enabled. Olvid will not be able to function properly until you remove it from the Restricted Apps list.

You can access this settings from:
App Settings > Advanced > Battery > Background restriction
Do you want to introduce %1$s and %2$s to one another?
Do you want to introduce %1$s to the %2$d following contacts?\n\n%3$s
Do you really want to delete attachment %1$s from this message?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Do you really want to delete attachment %1$s?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Do you really want to delete discussion %1$s and all the messages it contains?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Do you wish to disband the group %1$s?\nIt will no longer be possible to send messages to this group. Existing group messages will not be affected.

You are about to disband the group %1$s.
This will remove all members and pending members from the group. There are currently:
- %2$d members
- %3$d pending members

Proceed with disbanding this group?
Do you want to exchange codes with %1$s to re-validate their identity?
Do you wish to send %1$s a new invitation to join the group %2$s?
Do you want to add %1$s to your contacts?
You are about to leave the group %1$s. Other members of the group will be notified and you will stop receiving messages sent to this group.\n\nDo you really want to leave the group?

The secure channels between you and your contact might become de-synchronized. If you notice that messages you send are no longer received by your contact, recreating the secure channels could correct this.\n\nDo you wish to initiate the recreation of secure channels?
Do you really wish to restart the ongoing secure discussion channel establishment protocol?
Please enter a name which will be displayed to your contacts. These details will never be sent to Olvid\'s servers.
This screen displays the list of contacts you trust.\n\nTo add new contacts, press the blue + at the bottom of this screen.
This screen displays your ongoing discussions.
This screen displays the list of groups you belong to.
This screen displays the list of invitations you have received or sent.
Choose a group name to help group members identify the purpose of this group.
The group manager updated the Group Card. Both the old and new versions are shown below.\n\nPress \"update\" to update the group\'s information with this new version.
Your contact updated their Olvid Card. Both the old and new versions are shown below.\n\nPress \"update\" to update your contact\'s information with this new version.

A secure discussion channel is currently being established. You cannot start any discussion with this contact until this is done. This process should take a few seconds if both you and your contact are online.\n\nIf you believe that something went wrong, you can restart the channel establishment.
This invitation comes from an unknown user. It is recommended to ignore it.
%1$s would like to be part of your contacts. Please \"accept\" if you wish to proceed. Otherwise, you can \"ignore\".
%1$s wants to introduce you to %2$s. Accept?
An unknown contact wants to introduce you to %1$s. It is recommended to reject this invitation?
%1$s was added to your contacts following an introduction by %2$s.

To add %1$s to your contacts, please give them your code (%2$s) and enter theirs.\n\nPlease make sure that %1$s is indeed the one giving you this code: prefer a face-to-face meeting or a phone call (avoid email, SMS, or any other messenger).
You successfully entered the code of %1$s. Please communicate them your code (%2$s).\n\nPrefer a face-to-face meeting or a phone call (avoid email, SMS, or any other messenger).
You have joined the group %2$s managed by %1$s.
%1$s invited you to join the group %2$s.\n\nOlvid\'s security policy requires you to re-validate the identity of %1$s by exchanging 4-digit codes with them.
We are bootstrapping the secure channel between you and %1$s. Please wait…
Waiting for %1$s to accept the introduction from %2$s.
Waiting for %1$s to accept the introduction.
%1$s wants to introduce you to %2$s.\n\nOlvid\'s security policy requires you to re-validate the identity of %1$s by exchanging 4-digit codes with them, or to invite %2$s directly.
An unknown contact wants to introduce you to %1$s.\n\nPlease invite %1$s directly or abort this invitation.
Well done! A secure channel between you and %1$s is in progress. As soon as it is ready, you will be able to discuss with %1$s.
Not part of a group yet
Your messages will be automatically sent once a secure channel is established for this discussion. Until then, they will remain on hold.
Your messages will be automatically sent once someone else joins this group discussion. Until then, they will remain on hold.
Please fill in a first or a last name

%1$s invites you to join their network on Olvid. To accept, please click the link below:

%2$s
Choose how to send your invitation
Some files could not be attached to the message due to a bug in your Android version (multiple files returned the same URI). Please try again to attach missing files.
An attachment is still being processed. Your message will be sent when processing ends.
Permission to use camera was denied
The channel establishment protocol failed to restart
The channel establishment protocol was successfully restarted
Your device does not have a camera
Contact introduction requires an established secure channel
The file you selected could not be attached to the message
The file %1$s could not be attached to the message
The file %1$s is already attached to the message
Your message is on hold and will be sent as soon as possible
Shortcut creation not supported on your device
Unable to find a suitable application to open this file type
You are about to remove %1$s from your contacts. You will no longer be able to exchange messages with them.\n\nReally delete this contact?

You are about to remove %1$s from your contacts. You will no longer be able to exchange messages with them.

Note that %1$s is a pending member in %2$d groups you belong to. He might get added back to your contacts in a near future. You may want to leave these groups to avoid this.

Really delete this contact?
You cannot remove %1$s from your contacts as both of you belong to some common groups. You will need to leave these groups to proceed.

It seems the Google Play Services are not installed on your device. Olvid relies on these services to be notified of incoming messages. Without them, you will only receive new messages when Olvid is in the foreground.\n\nYou may instead enable a permanent WebSocket connection to Olvid\'s servers that can serve the same purpose (but may drain your battery).

Battery optimization on Android works by delaying certain background events to run them in a batch. This may delay the reception of inbound Olvid messages.\n\nTo ensure that your messages are received promptly, you may disable Battery Optimization for specific apps. We recommend disabling Battery Optimization by visiting the settings below and adding Olvid to the list of "Power-saving exceptions".
Do not show this message again
Messages posted in this discussion are protected using end-to-end encryption.\nTheir confidentiality, their authenticity, and the identity of their sender are guaranteed through cryptography.
An unknown member joined the group
An unknown member left the group
Restore dialogs hidden by \"do not show this message again\"
When this is on, people are notified when you have read their messages. This can be overridden in each discussion.
Turn this on to protect Olvid with a lock screen at startup.
When this is on, Olvid can be unlocked using the default biometric authentication method of your device.
Modify the PIN code used to unlock Olvid.
When this is on, all notifications are replaced by \"Olvid requires your attention\".
Use a password instead of a PIN
Use a PIN instead of a password
You will need to enter this PIN to unlock Olvid.\nIt can\'t be recovered and you may lose access to your Olvid data if you forget it.
Before you can proceed, you must enter the current PIN.
Delay before locking Olvid when it goes in the background
Biometric authentication not yet configured on your device.
Only show a notification when Olvid is unlocked.
Always show Olvid\'s lock status in a notification.
Verify or re-generate a backup key
Click to export an encrypted backup file to your device.
Click to export an encrypted backup file to your device.\nLatest export: %1$s
When this is on, Olvid will periodically upload an encrypted backup to the cloud.
Backup key generated: %1$s\nNumber of key verifications: %2$d\nLatest key verification: %3$s
Backup key generated: %1$s\nKey was never verified.
Failed to generate a new backup key. Please try again.

The backup key below will be used to encrypt all your Olvid backups. Please keep it in a safe place.\nOlvid will periodically check you are able to enter this key to ensure you do not lose access to your backups.
This is the only time this key will be displayed. If you lose it, you will need to generate a new one.
Failed to save backup. Please try again.

Welcome to Olvid.

If you are a new Olvid user, simply press "continue as a new user" below.

If you already used Olvid and want to restore your keys and contacts from a backup, press "restore a backup".

Please choose the location of the backup file you wish to restore.

Choose "from a file" to pick a backup file created from a manual backup.

Choose "from the cloud" to select an account used for automatic backups.
Unable to open selected backup file. Please try again.
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX
Please enter the backup key that was presented to you when you configured backups.\n\nThis key is the only way to decrypt the backup. If you lost it, backup restoration is impossible.
Backup key successfully verified.\nYou may proceed with the restoration.
Backup key verification failed.\nPlease check that you entered the correct key.
Backup key verification failed.\nThe key you entered is too short.
Backup key verification failed.\nThe key you entered is too long.
Are you sure you want to generate a new backup key?\n\nIf so, please make sure you are ready to write down this new key as it will be used for all future backups.
Failed to create backup file. Please try again.

Your Olvid ID has been deactivated on this device.

This is probably because you restored a backup on another device. Your Olvid ID can only be active on one device at a time.

If you wish to deactivate all your other installs of Olvid, press "reactivate Olvid on this device" below. Keep in mind that this will not allow you to receive messages on two devices simultaneously.

Press OK to dismiss this dialog and keep this device inactive: you will not be able to send or receive messages on this device, but may still browse your old discussions.
An error occurred. Please try again.
Your Olvid ID has been reactivated on this device.\n\nSecure channels are now being recreated with all your contacts.
An error occurred while selecting a Google Drive account
It seems Google Play Services are not installed on your device.\nAutomatic backups use Google Drive and cannot work without these Services.

Automatic backups periodically upload en encrypted backup of your keys and contacts to a reserved space on Google Drive, only accessible to Olvid.

If you wish to proceed, you will be prompted to choose the Google account on which to save these backups.

Olvid will not have access to any of your files on Google Drive.
Error, no Olvid backup was found on %1$s
Error while searching for a backup

In order to restore an Olvid backup from the cloud, you will need to select the Google Drive account on which the encrypted backup has been saved and grant Olvid the permission to access this file.\n\nOlvid will not have access to any of your other files on Google Drive
When this is on, Olvid will instruct compatible keyboards to use \"incognito mode\"
It seems Google Play Services are not installed on your device.\nCloud restore use Google Drive and cannot work without these Services.

Are you sure you wish to reactivate Olvid on this device?\n\nThis will deactivate Olvid on all your other devices. Keep in mind that this will not allow you to receive messages on two devices simultaneously.
When this is on, screenshots are disabled in Olvid and in the recent apps list.
You generated a new backup key. This is probably the right moment to export a backup to a file, or to activate automatic backups to the cloud.
You have not selected any contact to add to your group. Are you sure you want to create an empty group?
Enable dark mode to save your battery and your eyes.
You are already in a call. End it before starting a new one.
When activated, you won\'t be notified of new messages in this discussion.
This screen displays the list of calls you made or received.
Are you sure you want to remove all entries from your call log?
Permission to record audio was denied
Call failed - Call initiation not permitted
New biometric enrollment detected\nPlease authenticate with your PIN
New biometric enrollment detected\nPlease authenticate with your password
When enabled, logcat will include debug level logs for Olvid.
Do you really wish to exclude %1$s from this call?
You were excluded from this call
This subscription is already associated to another user
Send and receive messages and attachments
When activated, Olvid will attempt to remove sensitive metadata from imported photo files.\nThis includes GPS data, camera make, creation date…
Scanning the ID of another user allows you to invite them.
Please enter the PIN code displayed in your web browser
Creating a secure connection between your App and the WebClient…
Close current connection and start a new one?
Automatically send message when hitting Enter key.
Show a pop-up notification on browser when receiving a new message.
Enable notification sound in WebClient to be alerted of incoming messages.
Keep WebClient running as background task
Keep WebClient connection alive even if App is killed.
Show a notification on App when there is an error.
Activity detected in WebClient after an extended period of inactivity
Receive a notification in case of activity after 10 minutes of inactivity.
Sharing your ID allows another Olvid user to invite you.
%1$s is already part of your contacts. Adding them again will allow you to re-verify their identity.
Failed to invite contact, please try again
You cannot add your own Olvid ID to your contacts!
This license is for another Olvid server.
Malformed license activation link.\n\nPlease contact the person who sent you this link.
Please contact the person who sent you this link.
Premium features available for free until: %1$s
Get access to premium features for free for one month (only available once)
To keep your subscription to Olvid, please update your payment method
Initiating secure phone calls with Olvid requires a subscription.\n\nYou can check your current subscription status and see available subscription plans on the \"My ID\" page.
Connecting to the Olvid web client requires a subscription.\n\nYou can check your current subscription status and see available subscription plans on the \"My ID\" page.
Maintain a list of recent discussions
When this is on, Olvid will maintain a list of recent discussions and expose it to your Android system. This can make direct sharing with Olvid faster, but may expose the name of your contacts.
On, view messages when opening the discussion
Off, never retain wiped messages, delete them
On, retain wiped messages to see when they are delivered or read
When activated, read once messages and messages with the default limited visibility duration are opened as soon as you enter the discussion. Otherwise, a click is required.
When activated, wiped outbound messages are retained so you can see when they are delivered or read. Otherwise, they are deleted.
The settings below are shared between all participants in this discussion. Changing them will affect the default visibility and existence duration of messages sent by all participants.

The settings below are shared between all participants in this discussion. Changing them will affect the default visibility and existence duration of messages sent by all participants.\n\nOnly the group owner can modify these settings.
When activated, messages and attachments are displayed once, and are deleted when exiting the discussion.
Once read, messages are visible for: %1$s

You have modified the default ephemeral message settings for this discussion.\n\nDo you want to update these settings for you and all other discussion participants, or do you want to discard your changes?
You updated the discussion shared settings
The settings below allow you to automatically delete old messages in your discussions. They can be overridden in each discussion.
The settings below are applied by default to any new discussion you create. They will be shared with other participants in this discussion.
Enter the number of messages to keep in each discussion. Leave blank to keep all messages.\n\nUnread messages are never deleted.

Enter the number of messages to keep in this discussion.
Leave blank to use your default policy (keep all messages).

Unread messages are never deleted.

Enter the number of messages to keep in this discussion.
Leave blank to use your default policy (keep latest %1$d messages).
Enter 0 to keep all messages.

Unread messages are never deleted.
The settings below allow you to automatically delete old messages in this discussion. They have priority over your default retention policy.
Before recording voice messages, please grant Olvid the permission to record audio.

Before recording voice messages, Olvid requires the permission to record audio.\n\nIt appears that this permission has been permanently denied to Olvid. You should open the App Settings to manually grant this permission.
Play/pause controls when playing media in Olvid
If you select the \"delete everywhere\" option below, the message will be deleted for all participants in the discussion. Otherwise, it will be deleted only on your device.
If you select the \"delete everywhere\" option below, these messages will be deleted for all participants in the discussion. Otherwise, they will be deleted only on your device.
If you select the \"delete everywhere\" option below, this discussion will be deleted for all its participants. Otherwise, it will be deleted only on your device.
Unable to delete everywhere. Please try again.
New message notifications are currently muted.\n\nDo you want to unmute them?
New message notifications are muted until: %1$s.\n\nDo you want to unmute them?
Choose which regional TURN servers to use
This screen lets you choose additional options for the creation of your Olvid ID. You can enter the options manually or scan a configuration QR-code.
A newer version of Olvid is available from Google Play.\n\nPlease update to take advantage of the newest features.
It seems your Olvid server does not support secure call initiation.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more information.

This screen lets you to configure your company\'s identity provider in Olvid. Once configured, you can authenticate with this server and Olvid will let you to seamlessly add other employees to your contacts.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Unable to retrieve identity details from provider. Please try again.
Unable to connect to server. Please try again.
The name below was retrieved from your company\'s identity provider and can\'t be changed. You may still choose a profile picture. These details will never be sent to Olvid\'s servers.
Your Olvid ID is managed by your company\'s identity provider. You need to re-authenticate with this identity provider to continue.
Another Olvid ID is associated with your account on your company\'s identity provider. If you generated a new ID you need to replace the previous one.
Failed to replace previous Olvid ID, please try again

You Olvid ID is managed by your company\'s identity provider. It seems you authenticated as a different user than usual. This is not supported.\n\nPlease contact your administrator or re-authenticate as the correct user.
Your Olvid ID is managed by your company\'s identity provider.\n\nYou can easily add contacts inside your company by using the search field above and digging into its user directory.
You selected to add %1$s to your contacts. Do you want to proceed?

You are about to configure your company\'s identity provider in Olvid. Once configured, you can authenticate with this server and Olvid will let you to seamlessly add other employees to your contacts.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Olvid is already configured to use a DIFFERENT identity provider. If your company indeed changed identity provider, you can proceed by authenticating with this new provider. If in doubt, simply cancel.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Olvid is already configured with your company\'s identity provider.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Unable to connect to your company\'s identity provider. Please check your internet connection or contact your administrator for more details.
Unable to configure your company\'s identity provider with your current Olvid ID. Your ID was generated on a different Olvid server.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Unable to configure your company\'s identity provider. Your version of Olvid is outdated and is not compatible with your company\'s identity provider.\nPlease update Olvid and try again, or contact your administrator for more details.
The name below was retrieved from your company\'s identity provider.\nOnce your Olvid ID is managed by your this provider, this is how your contacts will see you in Olvid.
Successfully switched to a managed ID
Failed to switch to a managed ID

Your Olvid ID is currently managed by your company's identity provider. You are about to switch to a normal, un-managed, Olvid ID.

If you proceed, you will no longer be able to seamlessly add contacts from your company to Olvid. Please contact your administrator for more details.

Do you wish to proceed?

Your identity provider indicates that an Olvid ID is already associated to the user you signed in as. If you proceed, this Olvid ID will be revoked and your new one will be associated to this user.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Your identity provider indicates that an Olvid ID is already associated to the user you signed in as. You cannot proceed with the creation of your ID.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Your identity provider indicates that an Olvid ID is already associated to the user you signed in as. You cannot proceed with the configuration.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Olvid was unable to upload your Olvid ID to your company\'s identity provider. It will be retried in the background.
Your identity provider indicates that a different Olvid ID is associated to the user you signed in as and you do not have permission to update it.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Your Olvid ID is currently managed by your company\'s identity provider. You cannot manually activate an Olvid license.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.

Olvid is unable to use the message notification sound you selected. It was deactivated. A bug in Android 9 prevents the use of custom notification sounds to apps that do not request access to external storage/SD card.\n\nYou should try selecting a standard notification sound. Until then, your notifications will remain silent!
Use the settings below to modify the visibility and existence durations of your next message. You may only use more restrictive settings than the discussion\'s default.
Exporting app databases allows you to inspect exactly what Olvid stores internally.\nWarning: these databases contain all your sensitive information and should be kept in a safe place!

By clicking export, Olvid will generate a zip file containing the databases of both the engine and the application itself. You will be prompted to select where to save this zip file.\n\nWarning: these databases contain all your sensitive information and should be kept in a safe place!
Error exporting app databases. Please try again.
When active, your contact list is sorted by last name. Otherwise, the first name is used.
Display the last name of your contacts in uppercase
Explore the internal storage of your Olvid application!
Security check\nUnlock Olvid to connect to the web client
When this security feature is active, connecting to the webclient will require to unlock Olvid.

If you disable push notifications you will not be notified of new messages when Olvid is in the background. Keep in mind that Olvid never sends any data in these push notifications: the only information Google gets from them is that you received a message in Olvid.
When activated, Olvid will maintain a permanent connection to its server. This can improve message reception speed and reliability, but it may drain your battery.
When activated, the bandwidth used during calls will be reduced. This may reduce sound quality but can improve connection stability.

If you only disable Google push notifications, you will not be notified instantly of new messages.\n\nYou may instead want to enable a permanent WebSocket connection to Olvid\'s servers that can serve the same purpose (but may drain your battery).
Having a foreground service prevents Olvid from being stopped by the system. A small icon is displayed in your notifications area and can be hidden in the system preferences.
Share app and OS version with Olvid
When activated, your app will share its version and the version of your OS (and nothing more) with the Olvid servers. This data is extremely valuable when rolling-out new features.
Notify when a server certificate changes
When activated, Olvid will notify you every time the SSL/TLS certificate of one of the servers it connects to changes.
The SSL/TLS certificate of the server below changed and you have not yet agreed to trust it.
You do not trust any certificate for this server yet.
It seems the issuer of the server certificate changed for this new certificate. Please check the issuer chains below for any unexpected change.
The issuer of this certificate has not changed. This is probably only the certificate being renewed. Please check the expiration dates below to make sure a renewal was to be expected.

Your device is running low on available space. Expect to run into unexpected errors when receiving or sending files with Olvid.\n\nThis is probably the right time to free up some space on your device.
When activated, clicking an image attachment will open it in the internal viewer. Otherwise, your device\'s default image app will be used.

You have configured Olvid to use automatic backups to Google Drive, but your session has expired. You need to sign in to Google Drive again.\n\nIf you no longer want automatic backups, you can disable them in the App Settings. Keep in mind that automatic backups are the only way to prevent the loss of your contacts if your device is lost or damaged.
Clicking ADD CONTACT will add %1$s to your contacts.
Make sure the QR code you scanned was indeed presented to you by %1$s, directly on their device, from within the Olvid application.
%1$s is already part of your contacts.
If %1$s is next to you, have them scan this QR code to add them to your contacts directly.
Send an invitation to %1$s to add them to your contacts from a distance.
This QR cannot be used to add %1$s to your contacts.\nPlease try again, making sure %1$s scans your QR code before you scan their\'s.

Contact addition successfully initiated.

The process should take a few seconds if both you and %1$s are connected to the internet.

You and %1$s may now leave this screen.
Unable to query for installed browsers
Choose which browser to use for authentication
Do not use regional TURN servers
Request permission to access bluetooth devices
If you want to use a bluetooth headset for Olvid calls, you need to allow Olvid to \"find and connect to\" your nearby devices.

Olvid relies on alarms to precisely schedule screen lock and ephemeral messages deletion.
The permission to set such alarms has been revoked, which may cause these security features to misbehave.

We strongly encourage you to allow settings alarms and reminders by pressing the "app settings" button below.

Your version of Olvid is outdated and needs to be updated.\n\nYou are probably missing out on many new features and we cannot guarantee the compatibility of your version with newer versions of the app that your contacts may use.
WARNING: some application customization could not be restored
It appears that some permissions required for Olvid\'s secure phone calls are permanently denied.\n\nPlease open the App Settings and manually allow Olvid to record audio and manage phone calls.

This missing message indicator tells you that a gap was detected in the numbering sequence of messages received from your contact.\n\nThis can either be that the sending of a message was cancelled (the message will never reach you), or that a larger message (typically with attachment) has not finished uploading yet (you should receive it soon).

Olvid\'s secure phone calls need the permission to record audio from your microphone.\nWe also recommend granting the permission to manage phone calls so that regular incoming phone calls can be handled properly.
Unable to update your identity provider signature key. Please try again.

Olvid detected a change in the cryptographic signature key of your identity provider. This should normally never happen.\n\nPlease contact your administrator and only press \"update key\" if he can confirm the key change was intentional. If unsure, press \"cancel\".

It seems that your account was removed from your company\'s identity provider. If you left your company, this is normal and you may continue using Olvid as a free user.\n\nIf you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator to re-register this identity provider with Olvid.

If you were to lose your device, or to uninstall Olvid by mistake, you would lose your Olvid ID, all your contacts, and all your groups 😱. Luckily for you, it is possible to setup secure backups 😅.\n\nPress \"setup backups\" to begin.

In order not to lose any contact, we recommend you activate automatic backups to Google Drive. Don't worry, these backups are encrypted 🤓!
Otherwise, you may also perform manual backups on a regular basis.

Press "setup backups" to begin.

It\'s been more than a week since your last backup. Now is probably a good time for a new one. Keep in mind that an old backup might not contain all your latest contacts.\n\nPress \"setup backups\" to begin.
Do you remember your backup key?
Having an up to date Olvid backup is essential, but you need your backup key to restore it!\n\nPress \"setup backups\" to verify your key. If you lost it, don\'t worry, you can generate a new one.
Configuration link provided by the Olvid keycloak plugin
You are about to open a file with an external application. The content of this file will be exposed outside of Olvid.\nDo you wish to proceed?
Failed to unblock discussion, please try again

This discussion is locked because your contact was revoked by your company\'s identity provider. Their Olvid ID may have been compromised and the security of your communications cannot be guaranteed. Only unblock this discussion if you are sure that your contact\'s Olvid ID was never compromised.\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Contact revoked by your company\'s identity provider
Unable to write to selected folder
Some attachments could not be saved
Some attachments are not fully downloaded and could not be saved
When prompted, please select the folder in which to save this message\'s attachments.\nNote that access to some folders may be restricted.
Contact revoked by your company\'s identity provider

This contact was revoked by your company's identity provider. Their Olvid ID may have been compromised and the security of your communications cannot be guaranteed.

If you are sure your contact's Olvid ID was never compromised you may manually unblock them.
Please contact your administrator for more details.

This contact was revoked by your company's identity provider. Their Olvid ID may have been compromised and the security of your communications cannot be guaranteed.

You previously decided to manually unblock them. If you are unsure about your decision, it is recommended you re-block this contact.
Please contact your administrator for more details.

Your identity provider indicates that your Olvid ID was revoked, meaning it was potentially compromised. You cannot proceed with the configuration.\n\nPlease contact your administrator for more details.
Unable to load backup configuration. Please retry.
Notifications from your company\'s identity provider
Olvid needs you to authenticate with your company\'s identity provider.
You must have at least one visible profile

Hidden profiles are protected by a password and do not appear in you profile list until you enter this password.\nAccessing a hidden profile requires a long press on the \"add new profile\" button.\nIf you forget this password, you will permanently lose access to this profile!
Failed to create hidden profile password
You are about do discard the changes you made. In particular, the password you chose for this profile was not yet saved and will be lost.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
You are about to un-hide a hidden Olvid profile. This profile will become visible to anyone opening your Olvid application.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
You are about to hide an Olvid profile. If you forget the password you chose for this profile, you will permanently lose access to it.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
Mute the whole profile instead of this discussion
No policy set (hidden profile remains open)
When Olvid lock screen activates (requires a lock screen)
Chose when to close an open hidden profile

You chose to close any open hidden profile when the Olvid lock screen activate. However you have not configured any lock screen.\n\nIn the current setting, hidden profiles will only be closed when manually switching to another profile.
Close hidden profile when Olvid enters background…
No hidden profile closing policy defined

You have created a hidden profile but have not yet define when this profile should be closed.
Press OK to chose between the different policies offered by Olvid.

In the current setting, hidden profiles will only be closed when manually switching to another profile.

After several attempts, Olvid was unable to load your current backup configuration. If you already tried fully restarting Olvid/your device and you still get this error message, it is recommended you generate a new backup key.
Indicator that notifications are muted for this profile

You are about to create a new Olvid profile.

Inside Olvid, each profile is managed as a completely independent identity, with its own contact card, profile picture, and discussions.

You may for example have a work profile with a formal picture and your real name to discuss with your colleagues and a personal profile with a nickname for your friends and family.

You may also create a hidden profile that does not appear in your list of profiles and requires a password to open.
The identity provider of your company was successfully configured. Press the \"authenticate\" button below to authenticate with it and retrieve your personal information.

Welcome to Olvid.

This installation is managed by your company and was configured to use an identity provider. Press the "authenticate" button below to authenticate with it and retrieve your personal information.

If you already used Olvid and want to restore your keys and contacts from a backup, press "restore a backup".
Choose the profile to be managed by your company\'s identity provider
Choose the profile to which to apply this configuration/licence
Choose the profile to connect to the Olvid web client
Choose the profile with which to invite this contact
Please create a new profile first, then open this link again

Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile. Your other profiles will not be affected by this operation.
If you have enabled backups in Olvid, your future backups will not contain any trace of this profile and you will not be able to restore it.

Press "proceed" to choose how this profile should be deleted.

Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile.

This is your only visible profile and if you have any hidden profile, they will be deleted simultaneously.
If you have enabled backups in Olvid, your future backups will not contain any trace of this profile and you will not be able to restore it.

Press "proceed" to choose how this profile should be deleted.
Choose how to delete this profile

Choose to notify your contacts (recommended) so that:
 - your ID is deleted from your contacts's devices
 - you leave groups you joined
 - you disband groups you created

If you do not notify, unless you have transferred your profile to another device, your contacts may still try sending you messages and might not realize these messages cannot be delivered.

Your current profile appears to be inactive, meaning you probably transferred it to another device. If this is the case and plan to continue using this profile on your other device, choose not to notify your contacts.\n\nIf you do not want to use this profile ever again, you will need to reactivate your ID on this device first, wait for secure channels with your contacts to be recreated, and only then delete this profile.
Something went wrong, please try again

Your Olvid ID has been deactivated on this device.

This is probably because you restored a backup on another device. Your Olvid ID can only be active on one device at a time.

If you wish to deactivate all your other installs of Olvid, press "reactivate Olvid on this device" below. Keep in mind that this will not allow you to receive messages on two devices simultaneously.

Olvid now supports having multiple completely independent profiles inside one app. Each profile can use a different name and profile picture and has a separate set of contacts, groups, and discussions. You may also have hidden profiles that require an additional password to be accessed.\n\nWant to try this out? Tap on your profile picture at the top left of the main screen and simply press \"add new profile\" to get started!
Show neutral notification when profile is hidden

When a profile is hidden, unless it is currently open in Olvid, you do not receive any notification for new messages. If you activate this option, an \"Olvid requires your attention\" notification will be displayed. You can then open Olvid and unlock your hidden profile to see new messages.\n\nWarning: this may disclose the fact that you indeed have a hidden profile.

You opened a link to invite %1$s to join your network on Olvid.

Before being able to do so, you must first create your Olvid ID.

Press "proceed" to continue.

You chose to create a new profile when inviting %1$s to join your network on Olvid.

Before being able to do so, you must first create this new profile.

Press "proceed" to continue.
